name: 变身!昆虫少女! - Demo
description:
*Chinese/English version, may contain grammar mistakes. *中/英双语版，可能包含语法错误。 *WARNING: (way later in the game) may contain horror, self-harming, mental illness, gore. *警告：后期（假如能做到）可能包含恐怖，自残，精神疾病，血腥

Demo gameplay length：10-20min

Demo 游玩时间：10-20分钟

You, an ordinary Japanese high school student, have recently fallen into deep distress: a sudden confession from your best friend, an invitation from the gangsta girl, and the strange seduction from your art teacher --- what's even more frightening is that they can all turn into huge, monstrous insects! Confusion, hesitation, chaos, silently slides into your life ......

Who will you CHOOSE? 

你，一个普通日本高中生，最近陷入了深深的苦恼：同班好朋友的突然表白，高冷太妹的游乐场邀约，魅惑教师的主动勾引———更可怕的是，她们居然都能变成活生生的昆虫！混乱，犹豫，迷幻，悄无声息地渗透进你的生活……

那么，你最终该怎样选择呢？

PS:  This is my first time making VN, not even sure if anyone’s gonna play this.BUT, if you like this, please comment/support and recommend! If more ppl play this, I’ll continue making the full version of the game!🥺Thanks guys!

备注：这是我第一次做VN游戏，不确定会不会有人真的会来玩哈哈哈。不过如果你喜欢，请评论/支持/推荐我！如果有足够多的人来玩，我会继续做下去的！🥺非常感谢大家！

Follow me on instagram for more monthly update! @crazydiariy
